org.activebpel.work.factory
Interface IAeWorkManagerFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeDefaultWorkManagerFactory
public interface IAeWorkManagerFactory

Defines the interface for the factory that provides the CommonJ WorkManager and the IAeInputMessageWorkManager (input message work manager) to the engine.

Method Summary
 IAeInputMessageWorkManager getInputMessageWorkManager()
          Returns the IAeInputMessageWorkManager for scheduling input message work.
 commonj.work.WorkManager getWorkManager()
          Returns the CommonJ WorkManager for scheduling CommonJ Work.
 void init(java.util.Map aConfigMap)
          Initializes the work manager factory from the engine configuration.
 boolean isInternalWorkManager()
          Returns true if and only if the work manager returned by getWorkManager() is our internal implementation.
